alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Morton; Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 8:05PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Morton, southwestern Hamilton and Stanton Counties through 845 PM CDT/745 PM MDT/... At 805 PM CDT/705 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northeast of Two Buttes, or 18 miles northwest of The Saunders Elevator, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... The Saunders Elevator, Manter and Johnson City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT/1000 PM MDT/ for southwestern Kansas.
